column5: I have read all the books that came with my machine - but what is the "Red Line" rev for this inboard??   year - 2003  3.0 litre Alpha 1  nothing extra added - regular series  Want to find my top speed with this motor on my boat with GPS so I can advertise to sell  TY  The Bare
Look in your manual for W. O.T.  wide open throttle. Probably around 4500

Not 100% sure but they list a 3.0 Litre at 44-4800 rpm, and it's an inline 4.  Quite a few years back somone rplaced a Volvo Penta with one of Mercruiser series, I do believe it was a 2.2 ror 2.4 litre GM block.

Hey Bud, found these snippets and kinda similar to yours  What is the Maximum recommended RPM for a 3 liter Mercruiser,in a 18 foot Sea Ray? thanks! 4200-4600 I believe  heres a good site for info if you ask they will get back to you http://www.themarinedoctor.com/cgi-bin//YaBB.pl  cheers ian

Thanks Ian  -  turns out with my 3 liter - 4400 - 4800 is peak and top range - only had her at 4000 on Monday and hit 40 mph - so will bring her up to 4800 this weekend if smooth and see what happens.  Thanks all
your boat should be proped so that they max RPM is at WOT, any more (over-reving) and you could be doing damage, any less and you're loosing max power...
